short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension that displays market prices for items when trading

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your trading experience on EpicsGG.
- Display market prices directly in trades
- Adds colored labels to items with low circulation to avoid scams
- Sorts Brief History cards
- Adds prize odds to the spinner
